title: Hooked
description: Avoiding bad boy hockey player Marshall Winters has been one of my goals since he did me wrong four years ago.However, with both of us attending Boston University and his younger sister being my best friend, it’s damn near impossible.Then he saves me from a dangerous situation, whisking me away to his family’s cabin, changing everything.It’s just the two of us, no distractions, and nothing to keep us apart except my own rapidly fading reservations.Now, I’m getting hooked on the one person I shouldn’t be.
author: Jacob Chance
